sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" import { Col, Row } from "react-bootstrap" import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom" const MoviesDetails = () => { const params = useParams() const [movie, setMovie] = useState(0) const getMovieDetails = async () => { const res = await axios.get(`https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie/${params}?api_key=9896037be7d85d7cbca87d0f2b0774c3&query=s&language=en-US`) setMovie(res.data) } useEffect(() => {getMovieDetails()}, [null]); return (

اسم الفيلم: {movie.title}

تاريخ الفيلم: {movie.release_date}

عدد المقيمين: {movie.vote_count}

التقييم: {movie.vote_average}

{movie.overview}
) } export default MoviesDetails
